bio: I am technologist and creator in digital and traditional mediums. This site is a personal idea laboratory. Some years ago I had a bluehost website up, but the expense and time made me abandon it, as a thought experiment I threw this up on GIT using eleventy and converted some of the old content vibe coding with Windsurf in less than an hour, a task which would have taken at least four or five just a year ago. With all that free time what can I create?
